title: Is there any  class similar to tf.contrib.learn.monitors.ValidationMonitor in TF-Slim for evalution in logging?
body_html: I want to evaluate my model using validation data when training and show the evalution result in logging,which is similar to tf.contrib.learn.monitors.ValidationMonitor,and i can customize my metrics to evaluate.Is there any one in TF-Slim?
body_text: I want to evaluate my model using validation data when training and show the evalution result in logging,which is similar to tf.contrib.learn.monitors.ValidationMonitor,and i can customize my metrics to evaluate.Is there any one in TF-Slim?
body: I want to evaluate my model using validation data when training and show the evalution result in logging,which is similar to tf.contrib.learn.monitors.ValidationMonitor,and i can customize my metrics to evaluate.Is there any one in TF-Slim?
